# Logs
logs
*.log
npm-debug.log*

# Dependency directories
node_modules/
bower_components/

# Build directories
build/
dist/

# Google Cloud
.gcloud/
*.json

# Service account keys
*.key.json

# Environment variables
.env
*.env.*

# IDE and editor settings
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Yarn
.yarn/
.pnp.*
.yarnrc.yml

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp

# Coverage
coverage/

# Terraform
*.tfstate
*.tfstate.backup
.terraform/

# Kubernetes
*.yaml
*.yml

# Secrets
secrets/

# Miscellaneous
*.bak
*.backup
*.orig
